title: I Think We're Alone Now (feat. Nikki Glaser & Director Sean Donnelly)
description: Big Jay dines in the dark with Ari Shaffir in Toronto. Nikki Glaser joins the show and tells a story about feeling sex. Dan talks about an incident that started out great and ended with a girl throwing up in his apartment. Director Sean Donnelly calls into the show to talk about his film “I Think We’re Alone Now” about guys who stalk 80's pop star, Tiffany.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
